home.title: Anti-slip technology, waterproofing (sealing), cleaning
home.metaDescription: Experts providing specialized services in anti-slip protection and measurement, impregnation, thorough cleaning and descaling - order service today!

antislip.title: Professional anti-slip protection
antislip.metaDescription: Ensure the safety of users and avoid high costs associated with improper surface properties. Find out how to implement anti-slip protection - order the service today!

measurement.title: Anti-Slip, friction coefficient and PTV measurement | Tests and certifications
measurement.metaDescription: We perform slip resistance measurements of floors. Measurements of the PTV coefficient with the British Pendulum. Checking compliance with the requirements of the ITB. After the measurements, we issue a certificate of compliance.

sealing.title: Impregnation and protection of any type of surface
sealing.metaDescription: Impregnation effectively protects against the absorption of water, greasy stains, or other substances into the surface. Thanks to it, dirt can be easily removed and the material remains undamaged - discover the power of impregnation!

cleaning.title: Surface cleaning - deep cleaning, removal of efflorescence
cleaning.metaDescription: We remove most contaminants from long-term use of surfaces such as ceramic tiles, pool ceramics, natural stone, concrete or clinker - restore surfaces to their former glory!

knowledge.title: Knowledge - anti-slip measurements, duties and responsibilities
knowledge.metaDescription: Why should slip resistance be tested? What are the duties and responsibilities of the manager? Find out now!

contact.title: Contact
contact.metaDescription: We provide specialized services in anti-slip protection, thorough cleaning, descaling, waterproofing - contact us!

blog.title: Blog
blog.metaDescription: We share our knowledge of slip protection and the latest surface technologies - read more!
